column4: That output looks fine. What problem are you actually having?

no it's actually showing the correct size in this output. However when I try to access the drive I cannot. I cannot mount the drive in disk utility as well. The label is supposed to be bizzle but shows up as bajizzle which is the 1.5 TB drive
I'm not able to access the drive to view the contents.. I'm sure it's something simple that I just don't know how to do
First, have you rebooted since you swapped drives?
